name: Minetanite
description:
Controls

  • Build Mode - E
  • Movement - W, A, S, D
  • Shoot/Building - Left Click
  • Weapon Selection - 1, 2, 3, 4

Objective

  • Build resource stations to gather minerals & titanite
  • Hold against the bugs! Build turrets to help survival but be careful how much you’re spending!
  • Mine a thousand titanite & escape with your new resources!

Credits

  • Antanites
  • Glaikunt @glaikunt
  • Shubbz
  • Vault101 @vault101

If using the desktop version, ensure java 8 or higher installed and run:

java -jar minetanite-1.1.jar
